altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんたちに気をつけて！

altTitles.th: ระวังพี่ชายพวกนั้นให้ดี

altTitles.vi: Cẩn thận với các anh trai đấy!

description.ar:
حصلت هاري على تبنيها من قبل دوق إرنست في السابعة من عمرها عندما فقدت والدتها. على الرغم من أنها تلقت كل أنواع الاضطهاد من قبل أبناء إرنست الثلاثة ، إلا أنها استطاعت أخيرًا الهروب من تلك الدموع الدمويةعندما كانت على وشك الزواج. ولكن ما هذا؟ عندما استيقظت من نومي ، عدت إلى تلك الطفولة الجهنمية! هل هذا حلم؟! همف. إذا لم أستيقظ من هذا الحلم ، سوف أعيش على الأقل دون الكثير من الاهتمام للآخرين الآن! تماما مثل ذلك ، قرر هاري أن يذهب إلى الظلال!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EB%93%A4%EC%9D%84-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%AC%ED%95%B4/2367), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54286072)

description.en:
Harley, a destitute girl, got adopted by Duke Ernst at 7 years old when she lost her mother, as the Ernsts had themselves lost their youngest daughter Arina and sought Harley due to her resemblance to the late girl. Even though she received all kinds of persecution by the three Ernst sons in 20 years of life at the Ernst estate, she could finally escape that blood-and-tear inducing life when she was about to get married.

*But what is this? When I woke up from my sleep, I'm back to that hellish childhood! Is this a dream?! Hmph. If I can't wake up from this dream,  I'll at least live without too much consideration for others now!*

Just like that, Harley decided to go astray. Eugene, the "dutiful son" but cold, Cabel, the roughhousing knucklehead, and Erich, the angelic-looking bully and Arina's twin, *all three be damned!*

----
Harley thought that marriage would be her ticket out of the Ernst household and away from the family's three sons, aka her perpetual tormenters. But on the eve of her wedding, she's transported back in time 20 years to a youth she'd hoped to forget. As long as she's getting a second chance at childhood, Harley's determined to stand up to her bullies. But what began as retaliation quickly turns into reconciliation as both Harley and the Ernst brothers come to understand each other's pain.

---

description.fr:
Ressemblant comme deux gouttes d'eau à leur fille décédée, Hari a été recueillie par le duc Erenst à l'âge de 7 ans. Dans sa nouvelle famille, ses trois frères la rejettent et lui font subir toutes sortes de persécutions. Un an plus tard, après la mort de leurs parents dans un accident, sa relation avec les fils Erenst n'a fait qu'empirer. Les années passent et Hari est désormais une belle femme de 27 ans qui attend de pied ferme son mariage pour enfin se libérer de ses bourreaux. Mais quand le grand jour arrive enfin, elle se retrouve projetée dans le passé!

---

description.it:
Harley pensava che il matrimonio sarebbe stato il suo biglietto per lasciare la casa degli Ernst e allontanarsi dai tre figli della famiglia, ovvero i suoi perpetui tormentatori. Ma alla vigilia del suo matrimonio, viene trasportata indietro nel tempo di 20 anni, in una giovinezza che sperava di dimenticare. Finché avrà una seconda possibilità, Harley è determinata a resistere ai suoi bulli. Ma ciò che è iniziato come una rappresaglia si trasforma rapidamente in riconciliazione quando sia Harley che i fratelli Ernst arrivano a capire il dolore l'uno dell'altro.

---

description.ko:
7살에 어머니를 여의고 에른스트 공작가에 입양된 하리. 
에른스트의 삼 형제에게 갖은 핍박을 받아왔지만 
시집을 가게 되면서 드디어 피눈물 나던 생활을 끝내게 되었다. 

그런데 웬걸? 
자다 일어났더니 지옥 같던 어린 시절로 돌아온 게 아닌가! 꿈인가?! 

흥, 당장 깰 꿈이 아니라면 
이제는 나도 눈치 안 보고 맘대로 살 거야! 

하리는 그렇게 삐뚤어지기로 결심했다.

---

description.ru:
Хари, удочерённая герцогом Эрнст в семилетнем возрасте, вынуждена терпеть жестокие издевательства трёх старших братьев до самого дня своей свадьбы. Но завтра она наконец-то покинет этот дом, и её мучениям придёт конец. Как бы не так! Проснувшись, Хари понимает, что снова оказалась в своём кошмарном детстве. Сможет ли она пройти через этот ад ещё раз?

---

description.tr:
Hari, annesini kaybettiğinde Dük Erenst tarafından 7 yaşında evlat edinildi. Erenst'in üç oğlu tarafından her türlü zulme uğramasına rağmen sonunda evlendiğinde kan ve gözyaşı dolu bu hayattan kurtulabiliyordu.

*Fakat bu da ne?*

*Uyandığımda berbat geçen çocukluğuma geri döndüm! Bu bir rüya mı?*

*Hmph. Eğer bu rüyadan uyanamayacaksam en azından artık başkalarını çok fazla umursamadan yaşayacağım!*

*Bu şekilde Hari dalalete düşmeye karar verdi!*

---

description.zh:
海莉在7岁那年父母双亡，机缘巧合下被领养到公爵家，公爵夫妇虽然很疼她，但不久便离世，海莉在三个哥哥的各种虐待下过了20年之后终于出嫁，本以为就此逃离了魔爪… 怎么一觉醒来，重新回到了噩梦般的儿时？！不行，这次我决不能这么忍气吞声的活下去！…

---
